Technology type: CCTV; Computer vision; Deep learning; Machine learning; Object recognition. System purpose: Identify criminal suspects. Deployed by Vumatel/Vumacam. Sector: Govt - police; Govt - security. Location: South Africa. Year: 2018. Issues identified: Fairness; Human rights/civil liberties; Privacy/surveillance; Transparency. News trigger: Media investigation/fact check.
